title: FS (Price reductions) - A couple of tough to find off back T206 stars (one remains).
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (Price reductions) - A couple of tough to find off back T206 stars (one remains).
posts.post_content:
For Sale (Prices reduced) - Two more difficult to find stars with off backs.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover state ST.

T206 Clark Griffith Batting, Tolstoi - SGC 5 $900 venmo no fee or $935 pp gs

T206 Ed Walsh Portrait, Sovereign 150 - SGC 1  Sold
